contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 1, 1874 Y Windy Nook Contest
Windy Nook Contest 0 March Contest
windy-nook-contest
None
Windy Nook, Gateshead, Tyne and Wear, England, UK Two own choice marches. 10 bands competed.
Recounted in "The History of St. Hilda's Band", this resulted in a rematch between that band and West Wylam in October 1874, which was won comfortably by St. Hilda (then known as "Dennison's Borough").
Aug. 26, 2015, 9:31 a.m. Feb. 24, 2020, 10:25 a.m.
1 West Wylam Unknown March: The Vacant Chair
Unknown Result St. Hilda Colliery John Dennison March: The Vacant Chair
Unknown Result Windy Nook Temperance Unknown
